title: Update default Compare Progress slot 2 to 30 days back

requirements.text: Update the default Compare Progress slot targets so that when the Progress Comparison modal opens, Slot 1 defaults to 60 days back, Slot 2 defaults to 30 days back (replacing the prior 90-days-back default), and Slot 3 defaults to Today.

quotes:
Option 1: 60 days back
Option 2: 30 days back
Option 3: Today

acceptanceCriteria: Opening "Compare Progress" shows Slot 1 initialized to 60 days back, Slot 2 initialized to 30 days back, and Slot 3 initialized to Today.

The comparison query is executed with target dates corresponding to 60 days back, 30 days back, and today (local start-of-day), matching the UI selections unless the user overrides a slot via the calendar.

constraints: Frontend files listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.frontend.immutablePaths must not be edited.
nonGoals: Do not change backend comparison logic or endpoints (only update frontend defaults).
Do not introduce new comparison slots or change the comparison UI layout beyond the default date change.
